snippet: A principal was fined for trying to get her sister a job at a nonprofit that does business with her school; an elevator repairman also was fined for selling scrap metal from a city building.
abstract: A principal was fined for trying to get her sister a job at a nonprofit that does business with her school; an elevator repairman also was fined for selling scrap metal from a city building.

headline.main: Suspended Principal Among 5 Fined by Conflicts Board
